jdbcService.sql: select cac.name, cac.icon, cac.mixin, ca1.name, ca1.main, ca2.name, caa.id, null from component_anchor_action caa inner join component_anchor ca1 on caa.component_anchor.id= ca1.id inner join component_anchor ca2 on caa.target_anchor_id= ca2.id inner join component_action cac on caa.component_action_id= cac.id where ca1.component_template_id= :tempateId
